messages.subject: Re: Mush
messages.msgSnippet: It made me think of the wolf in Little Red Riding Hood. Those phrases sound open, honest, and even progressive but they don t embrace our ideals here. Very
messages.messageBody:
It made me think of the wolf in Little Red Riding Hood. Those phrases sound open, honest, and even progressive but they don't embrace our ideals here. Very cool, thanks Sandra.

Deborah








--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, Sandra Dodd <Sandra@...> wrote:
>
> After I wrote about clarity and about people promoting the support of "whatever" I continued through e-mail and came to links to a couple of facebook discussions, one on my own page, and one on another where I had been cited and so was magically summoned (facebook can be like that).
>
> I don't want to name names, I just want to show a few of the kinds of statements that are a problem when people are seeking a serious discussion, some knowledge and some clarity.
>
>
> -=-Teaching is also learning and it's totally OK to set up the experience as you work through it yourself. You know, whatever works for your family.-=-
>
> -=-what ever path you choose to home educate surely we should support each other no matter our difference of opinion-=-
>
> Sandra
>

messages.subject: Mush
messages.msgSnippet: After I wrote about clarity and about people promoting the support of whatever I continued through e-mail and came to links to a couple of facebook
messages.messageBody:
After I wrote about clarity and about people promoting the support of "whatever" I continued through e-mail and came to links to a couple of facebook discussions, one on my own page, and one on another where I had been cited and so was magically summoned (facebook can be like that).

I don't want to name names, I just want to show a few of the kinds of statements that are a problem when people are seeking a serious discussion, some knowledge and some clarity.


-=-Teaching is also learning and it's totally OK to set up the experience as you work through it yourself. You know, whatever works for your family.-=-

-=-what ever path you choose to home educate surely we should support each other no matter our difference of opinion-=-

Sandra
